value:
As a daughter of House Damiell, I
am expected to marry for politics,
not love.$k$pI have not even met the suitor my
father decided upon...

The noble houses of Begnion keep
their scions within a gilded cage from
the moment they are born.$k$pCan... Can I really live like that?

I can't even sleep at night because
I'm terrified of surprise attacks. It's
made me painfully aware of my frailty.

I don't have much fighting
experience. I want to learn so I can
hold my own in a battle.$k$pI don't want to be a burden.

Will you teach me how to fight like a
mercenary, $Nu?

Please accept this gift. I was tasked
with delivering it as a token of
$Nf's gratitude.

Changing your strategy based on the
circumstances—in other words,
adaptation... That's the key to victory.

I was taught that aim is everything to
an archer. A single accurate shot
can bypass even the heaviest armor.
What... What happened?

Oh, thank you... I appreciate your
doing this for me.

My name is Astrid. I may not be the
most seasoned fighter in this army,
but I will contribute however I can.

Oh...hello. Would you care to lend me
your ear, $Nu?$k$pI wish to discuss the circumstances
that led to me becoming a knight.$k$pWould it surprise you to learn that
the man my father gave my hand in
marriage to is even older than he is?$k$pGetting married away to improve your
family's standing... Such a thing is
considered ordinary in Begnion.$k$pMy older sisters suffered that fate,
and the letters I receive from them
are all warped and stained with tears.$k$pWhen destiny came calling, I saw
only one way out: volunteering for
military service.$k$pIt was a desperate attempt to delay
the inevitable, but so long as I remain
free, I wish to choose my own path.$k$pI may have lived a sheltered life, but
if you are willing to lead, yours is a
path I will readily follow.
たあっ
えいっ！
ああっ…
そんな…！
Your time grows short!
Repent while you can!
I can fight.
Out of my way!
I wanted to live free...
Hehe...
I am Astrid, of House Damiell. I may be of noble birth, but I can fight!
Pardon me, but is this some sort of jest?
Some say that I am ignorant to the wider world, but I think I just have much to learn.
I intend to live according to my own wishes, not those of my family. I want my life to be my own!

Oh, my pendant? My grandmother gave it to me when I was just a girl.
I wear it to remember her.

Are you teasing me? You're not? Oh...
I can't believe I said that... I'm so embarrassed...
I'm sure I will grow stronger if I continue fighting by your side.
Very well.
Show me.
Excuse me!
